question: Hi everyone I had a ultrasound today and im 30 weeks and the doctor said to me that im measuring bigger for 30 weeks he didnt say how much bigger but 2 weeks ago my baby weighed 3ibs 1oz at 28 weeks .. he is making me do a diabetes test friday .. he hasnt mentioned goin early yet but would that be a possibility if baby is big .. all babies in my family have been small howeever my partners family have been all big babies .. being between 8 and 11ibs so I dont know what does this mean .. any have the same expierence?
title: baby measuring big
